entry.title: tuberrabbit/mcp-server-notifier: Lightweight Node.js server sending webhook notifications. Ideal for devs using AI agents (e.g., Cursor) on multi-projects, alerting task completion for efficient switching. Features webhook alerts, multi-project dev, AI integration, easy setup for dev tools & automation.
entry.content: Lightweight Node.js server sending webhook notifications. Ideal for devs using AI agents (e.g., Cursor) on multi-projects, alerting task completion for efficient switching. Features webhook alerts, multi-project dev, AI integration, easy setup for dev tools & automation.
